short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add features to https://online-go.com to discourage bad habits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can view the source code to this extension here: https://github.com/sharafian/ogs-helper

Right now this lets you disable analyze mode automatically in your games, and adds a "Think" button to lock up the go board for a short time in order to make you read your moves. It also includes a feature to hide your opponent's ranks.
